description: Defines the RecipeDetail component for a recipe application, responsible for fetching and rendering detailed recipe information including image, title, metadata, ingredients, steps, nutrition, and user interactions such as toggling favorites and checkbox for ingredients. Also handles keyboard navigation within the UI.

methods.name: backToList
methods.description: Navigate back to the previous list view, preserving list state via router back.

methods.name: favToggle
methods.description: Toggle the favorite status of the current recipe using store actions.

methods.name: toggleIngredient
methods.description: Toggle the checkbox state for a specific ingredient index.

methods.name: moveFocus
methods.description: Move focus across header buttons and main sections based on delta.

methods.name: moveSection
methods.description: Navigate within ingredients or steps sections.

methods.name: isHeaderFocused
methods.description: Check if header button at given index is currently focused.

methods.name: isIngredientFocused
methods.description: Check if a specific ingredient row is focused.

methods.name: isStepFocused
methods.description: Check if a specific step row is focused.
